Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when there are another 2 or more
"Tournament Participants" Category allies or another "Representatives
of Universe 7" Category ally on the team upon the character's entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Guards all attacks, DEF 170%{passiveImg:up_g} and launches an
additional Super Attack for 3 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- High chance of performing a critical hit
- High chance of evading enemy's attack
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (TEQ excluded)
to TEQ Ki Spheres
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g} when HP is 70% or more
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g} when HP is 70% or less
*1 or more TEQ Ki Spheres obtained*
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*When all allies attacking in the same turn are "Representatives of
Universe 7" Category characters*
- ATK 70%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of performing a critical hit 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
*After the character's or an ally's Revival Skill is activated*
- {passiveImg:forever}Guards all attacks
- {passiveImg:forever}DEF 170%{passiveImg:up_g}
- {passiveImg:forever}Launches an additional Super Attack
- {passiveImg:forever}Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading
enemy's attack 20%{passiveImg:up_g}

7668.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes immense damage to enemy 
while sacrificing 5% HP
